title: Experiential Learning-Based Civic Consciousness Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Project-based activity design for fostering civic consciousness linked to the mathematics curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can analyze community issues and propose solutions through math problem-solving processes.
Learners can plan and execute civic-minded projects with peers using online collaboration tools.
Learners can design citizen participation activities utilizing mathematical concepts while developing experiential learning materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
